body_html: There is no supported Java API for TensorFlow at present, but you could look at the source of the Android JNI wrapper for guidance in how to build your own interface.
body_text: There is no supported Java API for TensorFlow at present, but you could look at the source of the Android JNI wrapper for guidance in how to build your own interface.
body: There is no supported Java API for TensorFlow at present, but you could look at the source of the [Android JNI wrapper](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/e39d8feebb9666a331345cd8d960f5ade4652bba/tensorflow/examples/android/jni) for guidance in how to build your own interface.
